django.contrib.sessions.middleware
==================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.sessions.middleware


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.sessions.middleware.SessionMiddleware


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: SessionMiddleware(get_response)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.utils.deprecation.MiddlewareMixin`


   .. py:attribute:: SessionStore


   .. py:method:: process_request(request)


   .. py:method:: process_response(request, response)

      If request.session was modified, or if the configuration is to save the
      session every time, save the changes and set a session cookie or delete
      the session cookie if the session has been emptied.
